name: Speed Dating
description:
Speed Dating is a dating simulation game where the player meets a beautiful woman during a speed dating session. You both have conversations where you get to make choices to progress the date. However, during the conversation, your identity and the woman's name are unknown until the end.

Speed Dating is a project made to challenge social norms and show a new perspective towards the dating scene.

KNOWN BUGS

If no dialogue is appearing, click on the Dialogue speed in the settings menu in the top left. It should fix the issue.

Art created by Lindsey Montague

http://comealight.deviantart.com/
